metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44542 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A memory leak vulnerability was found in Privoxy when handling errors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-44542` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

privoxy - 3.0.33-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: privoxy package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.33-1').
